checks.diagnostic:
questions/question_one.py:56:13: PLR1730 [*] Replace `if` statement with `minimum_value = min(value, minimum_value)`
        |
     54 |       for row in matrix:
     55 |           for value in row:
     56 |               if value < minimum_value:
        |  _____________^
     57 | |                 minimum_value = value
        | |_____________________________________^ PLR1730
     58 |       return minimum_value
        |
        = help: Replace with `minimum_value = min(value, minimum_value)`
     
     questions/question_one.py:93:13: PLR1730 [*] Replace `if` statement with `maximum_value = max(value, maximum_value)`
        |
     91 |       for row in matrix:
     92 |           for value in row:
     93 |               if value > maximum_value:
        |  _____________^
     94 | |                 maximum_value = value
        | |_____________________________________^ PLR1730
     95 |       return maximum_value
        |
        = help: Replace with `maximum_value = max(value, maximum_value)`
     
     Found 2 errors.
     [*] 2 fixable with the `--fix` option.
